Oops, sorry, missed it.

::Firearm::

Firearm felt the shots from Squawktalk hit his armor, and then felt 
Beastbox's hand dig into his back. He growls, transforming into tank 
mode. He was right above the ground, flying down toward it, with 
Beastbox's hand dug into his underside.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Jus so you know, Squawktalk had fired on you too.
> 
> BIC: Beastbox got hit in the head by the leg, and his hands let go, 
he
> almost fell, but his feet held him firmly in place, his leg motors,
> strained as he righted himself and shot once more into the same 
area he hit
> before, now hoping it was weak, he tried to plunge one of his arms 
into the
> metal he had been shooting.
